ticket.headerDesc: We would like to Introduce our Observation Deck.
ticket.ticketCounterDesc: You can buy entrance ticket at B1 ticket counter.
ticket.useTime: Use Time 09:00 ~ 24:00 (Ticketing Counter close at 23:00)
ticket.discount:
• From 9:00 to 10:00 Discount 50%.
  • From 22:00 to 23:00 Discount 50%.
  • Family package( Min 2 adults & Max 5 kids) Get 50% off for kid only.
ticket.note:
• The domestic discount applies to Vietnamese citizen only.
  • 3 Years Children or under age are free.
  • All ticket fares are included VAT(10%)
  • Purchasing the tickets at Ticketing Counter located in B1 floor.

Observation deck on the day until 23:00

about.text1:
The Lotte SkyWalk Observatory is located at the top of the Lotte Center Hanoi. As the third tallest building in Vietnam,
it is the only place where you can take in a gorgeous 360-degree view of Hanoi, the capital city of Vietnam roaring with brilliant history and dynamic modern culture.
about.text2:
The Observatory offers a diverse range of unique experiences that can only be had at a thrilling height of 253 meters in the air, including various exhibitions based on the theme "The Ao Dai of Vietnam,"
a café above the clouds, and exclusive tower-themed souvenirs.
about.text3:
Visitors can see all of the different facets of Hanoi Sky,
ever-changing with the four seasons and time of day.

contact.headerDesc: Please feel free to leave a message. We will response as soon as possible
